description: This Tool provides functionality to extract build numbers and associated KB articles from Windows Update processes. It is instrumental for system administrators who need to track updates and ensure their systems are running the latest patches. The Tool can process logs or output from Windows Update operations, parsing relevant build number information and linking it to specific KB articles for easy reference. System administrators can integrate this Tool into their patch management workflows to enhance visibility and accountability for applied updates. Further details on its configuration and usage can often be found in related documentation.
